author: adityapatwardhan
body: Updated strings in md, docker and yml and sh files to reflect the beta.4 version.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Travis CI is expected to fail because it depends on `tools/download.sh`. However, I don't see you update the `.spelling` file. Did you do the spellchecking? See https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#spellchecking-documentation

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body:
I was surprised as well that I need not update the .spellings file. Maybe I need to update with the CHANGELOG.md.

On branch beta4.updatestrings
nothing to commit, working tree clean
